title: Enchanting Gulabi Pushpa Jhumka: Diamond and Rose Quartz Floral Earrings
materials: 18K Rose Gold with White Diamond Pavé Setting and Rose Quartz center stones. Features Hyderabadi craftsmanship. Gold weight: 20.020(FG) grams.
features: These exquisite earrings feature a delicate cascading floral design. Each bloom is intricately crafted with a pavé setting of sparkling white diamonds, lending a subtle shimmer to every petal. The design incorporates a central rose quartz gemstone, set as the heart of the flower. The jhumka's design evokes images of rose-filled gardens. The design uses rose gold with diamonds as an accent for the overall rose effect.
colors: and delicate Pink Rose Quartz. A classic and modern color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you desire a touch of floral elegance. These also make excellent gifts for anniversaries and birthdays.
description: These earrings represent a fusion of classic jhumka sensibilities with a modern floral design. The rose quartz provides a soft, feminine touch, while the brilliant diamonds provide a timeless sparkle. Expertly crafted, these earrings are a statement of elegance and enduring style, making them a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. The use of rose gold will ensure that the jewelry will go well with any skin tone.
